title: SET_PLAYER_WANTED_LEVEL
content:
0xB7A0914B// SetPlayerWantedLevel
void SET_PLAYER_WANTED_LEVEL(Player player, int wantedLevel, BOOL delayedResponse);Parameters:player: the target playerwantedLevel: the wanted level 1-5delayedResponse: false = 0-10sec police spawn response time, true = 10-20sec police spawn response timeSET_PLAYER_WANTED_LEVELThis is the server-side RPC native equivalent of the client native SET_PLAYER_WANTED_LEVEL.
codeBlocks:
// SetPlayerWantedLevel
void SET_PLAYER_WANTED_LEVEL(Player player, int wantedLevel, BOOL delayedResponse);

local player = PlayerId()
-- Example usage for SET_PLAYER_WANTED_LEVEL
SetPlayerWantedLevel(player, 0, false)
